did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Photocopy of holograph minutes of City Council meetings for the periods Sept. 10, 1880 to Aug. 22, 1887 and Sept. 20, 1926 to Sept. 14, 1931, in 6 volumes. Includes appointments of city officials including special law enforcement agents, and acknowledgements of debts incurred by the City of Tombstone.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Tombstone Common Council Minutes (AZ 338). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Elected officials governing the City of Tombstone.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of holograph minutes of City Council meetings for the periods Sept. 10, 1880 to Aug. 22, 1887 and Sept. 20, 1926 to Sept. 14, 1931, in 6 volumes. Includes appointments of city officials including special law enforcement agents, and acknowledgements of debts incurred by the City of Tombstone.
Photocopied by the University of Arizona Library from the copy at the Tombstone City Hall, 1974.
